text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActMood where concept is-a _ActMoodCompletionTrack

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActMood
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActMoodCompletionTrackActMoodCompletionTrackThese are moods describing activities as they progress in the business cycle, from defined, through planned and ordered to completed.

name: ActMoodCompletionTrack
title: ActMoodCompletionTrack
description: These are moods describing activities as they progress in the business cycle, from defined, through planned and ordered to completed.
